description: Same as settings page but appears only on mobile phones.
The main settings component, it defines the layout and includes the rest of the components
Allows the user to change their theme and the primary color of the website
Allows the user to change thier password after confirming the previous one

Includes all account changes that could be made by the user
Change username, email, password
Allows the user to change thier email after code verification

Shows the username and email of the current user and allows the user to change them 
The user must confirm their password to see that information
The page changes based on whether the user has confirmed their password or not
Allows the user to change thier username
Displays a list muted users and allows the user to unmute or mute them again
Displays a list blocked users and allows the user to unblock or block them again

Displays the different search results in different tabs
Top: some people and all posts 
Latest: all posts
Peaople: all people
Shows up when the user tries to go to a non existing page or a page they can't access
